sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Welsh: Roedd y crio rhyfel dros gyfiawnder i gyd drosodd i giarin yr awdurdodau.
backtrans: War crying for justice was all over to authorize the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Welsh: Mae penderfyniad y gyfundrefn yn ad-drefnu'r agenda sylfaenol.
backtrans: The regime decision reorganizes the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Welsh: Roedd y gymuned yn bryderus ynghylch pasio'r diwygiadau sydd eu hangen yn fawr.
backtrans: The community was concerned about passing the necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Welsh: Cyhoeddodd y Tank Think bapur yn amlinellu eu ymddiheuriad o gosb cyfalaf.
backtrans: The Tank Think published a paper outlining their apology from a capital penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Welsh: Gadawyd i ddilysrwydd ddilysrwydd y ddeiseb
backtrans: The validity of the validity of the petition was left

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Welsh: Roedd y Llywydd yn annog ei weinidogion i fwclu fel cefnogaeth yr wrthblaid allweddol ar gyfer ei gynllun economaidd ar fin bwcl.
backtrans: The Presiding Officer urged his Ministers to buckle as the key opposition support for his economic plan on BWLB.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Welsh: Cafodd y pleidleiswyr eu bwydo i weld y bil yn cael ei basio.
backtrans: The voters were fed to see the bill being passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Welsh: Fe wnaeth naratif dadleuol y cyfreithiwr droi'r rheithgor.
backtrans: The lawyer's controversial narrative turned the jury.

Welsh: Roedd y llys wedi ymrwymo i'r trais!
backtrans: The court was committed to the violence!

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Welsh: Roedd y bloc UE yn gwrthwynebu gosod mesurau gwrth-ddympio yn y pen draw.
backtrans: The EU block objected to the ultimate installation of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Welsh: Penderfynodd yr Asiantaeth Gig-Economi i addurno'r ad-daliadau!
backtrans: The NHS-Economy Agency decided to decorate the repayments!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Welsh: Fe wnaeth aelodau o'r mudiad chwyldroadol gwrth-theocratic ddinistrio'r cyfoedion mewn grym!
backtrans: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement destroyed the peers in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Welsh: Penderfynodd yr hyfforddwyr yn siomedig i ymladd gyda'r gwladychwyr.
backtrans: The trainers decided disappointed to fight with the colonists.
